long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PushNote is simple popup that allows you to send any text/URL you input to your phone or other device as a notification via Pushover.

Requires a Pushover account ($5 with 30 day free trial)


An unofficial Pushover extension to send notifications from the Pushover.net service
***The author of this plugin has no affiliation with Pushover, LLC.***
